title: Why Losing Weight Feels Impossible: The Science Behind Your Struggle
content: The more strenuous the activity, the more calories you burn. For example, an hour of walking burns around 260 calories, moderate swimming burns 430, biking 600, and running 700. If you consume more calories than you expend, your body stores the excess as fat. One kilogram (or two pounds) of fat is roughly 7,000 calories. content: Tetiana Beibyko, a pensioner in eastern Ukraine, now has a polyethylene window in her home after the glass windows of her five-story building were shattered by shelling. More than 28 months into Russia’s full-scale invasion, around 10 million windows in Ukraine have been destroyed, according to the group Insulate Ukraine. Beibyko lives about 50 kilometers (31 miles) from the front lines and is one of over 4,000 people who have had their broken windows replaced with inexpensive polyethylene...

title: Donald Trump Suggests He Would Not Defend Taiwan from China
content: Donald Trump has cast doubt over whether as U.S. president he would defend Taiwan if China were to invade the self-governed island Beijing views as a breakaway province. "Taiwan is 9,500 miles away," Trump told , "it's 68 miles away from China." The U.S. does not recognize Taiwan as an independent state, but is opposed to any attempt by Beijing to take the island by force. Trump appeared to suggest that Taiwan should pay the U.S. for protection, telling the outlet, "I don't think we're any...

title: What time is the King's Speech at State Opening of Parliament?
content: King Charles III is set to give just the second King's Speech in more than 70 years on Wednesday (July 17) at the State Opening of Parliament. The King's Speech is where the UK Government sets out its legislative agenda for the new parliamentary session. Wednesday's speech will only be Charles' second since taking over the role of King following the death of his mother Queen Elizabeth II. The last State Opening and King's Speech took place on November 7, 2023. What time is the King's Speech?...

title: Python Meat Used As Alternate Animal Protein Source In Thailand
content: Wild python has long been eaten throughout Southeast Asia. They are being raised for their robust, diamond-patterned skins, which are sold to high-end European fashion houses for belts, bags and handbags, but some scientists and industry insiders believe the snakes' true value could lie in their meat. title: The gruesome Gulag mosquito punishment
content: In the ‘Solovetsky’ camp, guards would use mosquitoes as an instrument of sophisticated torture. "The warden got angry and ordered to put them 'on mosquitoes’," Oleg Volkov, a former Soviet camp prisoner, recalled in his book ‘Diving into Darkness’. The prisoner, most often naked, was tied to a tree in the dense ‘Solovetsky’ forest, to be literally “eaten” by mosquitoes. title: UK inflation stays at 2% target in June, leaving possible rate cut on a 'knife edge'
content: The Office for National Statistics said the largest upward contribution to the annualized inflation rate came from restaurants and hotels, with some economists attributing the increases to Taylor Swift's tour of the U.K. The biggest downward contribution came from clothing and footwear, with widespread sales during the month. The flat reading compared to June a year ago was a tad higher than expected. Most economists had anticipated a modest decline to 1.9%. The last time inflation was at 2%...

title: Government urges Bangladesh’s universities to close after 6 die in protests
creator: Julhas Alam, The Associated Press
content: DHAKA, Bangladesh (AP) — Authorities in Bangladesh urged all universities to close on Wednesday, after at least six people died in violent protests over the allocation of government jobs. Some universities quickly moved to comply, but others, including Dhaka University at the center of the protests, were still deciding how to respond. The country’s universities are run autonomously and the request from the University Grants Commission did not have legal force. Julhas Alam, The Associated Press

content: ঢাকা বিশ্ববিদ্যালয়ের (ঢাবি) সূর্যসেন হলে এক ছাত্রলীগ নেতা কক্ষ থেকে পিস্তল উদ্ধার করেছে সাধারণ শিক্ষার্থীরা। মঙ্গলবার সকাল পৌনে ১১টার দিকে শিক্ষার্থীরা সূর্যসেন হলের ৪৪০ নম্বর কক্ষে তল্লাশি চালিয়ে পিস্তল উদ্ধার করে হল প্রাধ্যক্ষের কাছে হস্তান্তর করে। এ সময় হলের নিরাপত্তা নিয়ে শিক্ষার্থীদের তোপের মুখে পড়েন প্রাধ্যক্ষ অধ্যাপক ড. জাকির হোসেন ভূঁইয়া। আরও পড়ুনরূপগঞ্জে চাঁদা না দেওয়ায় ব্যবসায়ীকে সন্ত্রাসীদের গুলি, বাড়ি-ঘরে লুটপাট জানা গেছে, হলের ওই কক্ষে ছাত্রলীগের সাধারণ সম্পাদক শেখ...

title: সুপার ফুড সজিনা
content: বাংলাদেশের অতি পরিচিত এক সবজি সজিনা বা সজনে পাতা। সজনে পাতা বিভিন্ন ধরনের খাবারের আনুষাঙ্গিক উপকরণ হিসেবে ব্যবহার করা হয়। বৈশ্বিকভাবে সজিনা ‘সুপার ফুড’ হিসেবে পরিচিত। তবে এর গুণাগুণ সম্পর্কে খুব কম মানুষই অবগত। কী আছে সজিনাতে এবং কেনই বা একে ‘সুপার ফুড’ বলা হয়?গুল্মজাতীয় উদ্ভিদ সজিনার বৈজ্ঞানিক নাম Moringa Oleifera।শুঁটির আকৃতির বীজের কারণে ইংরেজিতে একে ‘ড্রামস্টিক ট্রি’ বলা হয়। পুষ্টি, ঔষধিগুণ ও সারা বছর ফলন পাওয়া যায় বলে বাড়ির আঙিনায় জন্মানো এই গাছকে ‘মাল্টিভিটামিন বৃক্ষ’ও বলা যায়।...

title: রাজধানীতে ‘হায় হোসেন’ মাতম করে তাজিয়া মিছিল
content: পবিত্র আশুরা উপলক্ষ্যে ধর্মীয় মর্যাদা ও ভাবগাম্ভীর্যপূর্ণ পরিবেশে রাজধানীতে হাজারো মানুষের অংশগ্রহণে তাজিয়া মিছিল শুরু হয়েছে। আজ বুধবার (১ জুলাই) সকাল ১০টায় পর বের হওয়া এই মিছিলে শিয়া সম্প্রদায়ের হাজারো মানুষ অংশ নিয়েছেন। পুরান ঢাকার হোসেনি দালান থেকে শুরু হয় মিছিলটি। খালি পায়ে, বুক চাপড়ে ‘হায় হোসেন, হায় হোসেন’ মাতম তুলে, লালবাগ, আজিমপুর, নিউ মার্কেট, নীলক্ষেত ঘুরে, সায়েন্স ল্যাবরেটরি মোড় হয়ে ধানমণ্ডির দিকে এগিয়ে যায়। পরে ধানমণ্ডি লেকের পাড়ে প্রতীকী ‘কারবালা’ প্রান্তে...

title: পাবনায় বিদ্যুৎস্পৃষ্ট হয়ে প্রাণ গেল ভাই-বোনের
content: পাবনায় বিদ্যুৎস্পৃষ্ট হয়ে রাসেল হোসেন (১৩) ও ফারজানা ইয়াসমিন নামের (২৩) নামের দুই ভাই-বোনের মৃত্যু হয়েছে। আজ বুধবার (১৭ জুলাই) সকাল ৮টার দিকে আটঘরিয়া উপজেলার একদন্ত ইউনিয়নের চাচকিয়া গ্রামে ঘটনাটি ঘটে।মৃত দুই ভাই-বোন ওই গ্রামের মো. হিরু ইসলামের ছেলে-মেয়ে। এ ঘটনায় গুরুতর আহত হয়ে তার স্ত্রীও হাসপাতালে চিকিৎসাধীন আছেন। এ ঘটনায় এলাকায় শোকের ছায়া নেমে এসেছে।স্থানীয় সূত্রে জানা গেছে, আজ বুধবার ১০ মহররম উপলক্ষে তাঁত শ্রমিকদের ছুটি থাকায় হিরু ইসলামের বড় মেয়ে ফারজানা তাঁতের মেশিন...

title: অনির্দিষ্টকালের জন্য মাঠের বাইরে মেসি
content: কোপার ফাইনালের দিন মাঠ ছেড়ে যাওয়ার সময়ই শঙ্কা জেগেছিল বড় দুঃসংবাদ অপেক্ষা করছে লিওনেল মেসির জন্য। গতকাল পরীক্ষা-নিরীক্ষার পর সেটাই প্রমাণিত হলো।কলম্বিয়ার বিপক্ষে ফাইনালে ডান পায়ের গোড়ালিতে চোট পাওয়া মেসি অনির্দিষ্টকালের জন্য মাঠের বাইরে। ইন্টার মায়ামি তাদের বিবৃতিতে লিখেছে,‘পরীক্ষা-নিরীক্ষার পর নিশ্চিত হওয়া গেছে, মেসি ডান অ্যাঙ্কেলের লিগামেন্টে চোট পেয়েছেন। অধিনায়ককে পাওয়ার বিষয়টি নির্ভর করছে তার পর্যায়ক্রমিক সেরে ওঠা এবং সেগুলোর মূল্যায়নের ওপর।’ পরীক্ষা-নিরীক্ষার আগে...

title: আন্দোলনরত শিক্ষার্থীদের ওপর হামলার প্রতিবাদে ছাত্রদলের বিক্ষোভ
content: বৈষম্যমূলক কোটা ব্যবস্থা সংস্কারের দাবিতে আন্দোলনরত শিক্ষার্থীদের হত্যা ও আহত করার প্রতিবাদে লক্ষ্মীপুরে বিক্ষোভ মিছিল করেছে ছাত্রদল। এ সময় কোটা আন্দোলনকারীদের ওপর হামলার ঘটনায় ছাত্রলীগকে দায়ী করে সরকার বিরোধী বিভিন্ন স্লোগান দেন নেতাকর্মীরা।আজ বুধবার (১৭ জুলাই) সকাল ১১টার দিকে জেলা ছাত্রদলের উদ্যোগে বিএনপির যুগ্ম-মহাসচিব শহীদ উদ্দিন চৌধুরী এ্যানি লক্ষ্মীপুরের পুরাতন গোহাটা এলাকার বাসভবন থেকে মিছিলটি শুরু হয়। পরে গোডাউন রোড এলাকায় সংক্ষিপ্ত সমাবেশে মিলিত হন নেতাকর্মীরা।জেলা...

title: ২৬ বছর পর আসছে ‘সোলজার ২’, ববি-প্রীতি থাকছেন কি?
content: দীর্ঘ সময় বলিউডে অনুপস্থিত থাকার পর স্বমহিমায় ফিরেছেন দেওল পরিবার। একদিকে সানি দেওলের গাদার ২ যেমন ব্লকবাস্টার ছিল, তেমনি অ্যানিমেলে রণবীরের সঙ্গে টেক্কা দিয়ে অভিনয় করে দর্শক হৃদয় জয় করেছেন ববি দেওল। এরপর থেকেই ববির চাহিদা তুঙ্গে। এবার শোনা যাচ্ছে, ববি দেওলের ক্যারিয়ার সেরা চলচ্চিত্র ‘সোলজার’-এর সিক্যুয়েল আসতে চলেছে। আগামী বছরই ‘সোলজার ২’-এর শুটিং শুরু হবে। এমনটাই জানিয়েছেন প্রযোজক রমেশ তুরানি। তবে এতে ববি দেওল থাকছেন কি?১৯৯৮ সালে মুক্তি পেয়েছিল ‘সোলজার’। রমেশ ও কুমার তুরানির...

title: হল না ছাড়ার ঘোষণা কোটা আন্দোলকারীদের
content: কোটা সংস্কার আন্দোলনে ছাত্রলীগ ও শিক্ষার্থীদের ধাওয়া-পাল্টাধাওয়ার ঘটনায় গতকাল মঙ্গলবার দেশজুড়ে ফুঁসে উঠেছিল শিক্ষার্থীরা। এর মধ্যে দেশের বিভিন্ন জায়গায় ছয়জন নিহতের ঘটনা ঘটে। এমন পরিস্থিতিতে দেশের সব বিশ্ববিদ্যালয় বন্ধের ঘোষণা আসে। এরপর শিক্ষার্থীদের আজ বুধবার দুপুরের মধ্যে হল ছাড়তে নির্দেশ দেয় বিশ্ববিদ্যালয় কর্তৃপক্ষ। তবে শিক্ষার্থীরা এমন নির্দেশনা মানতে নারাজ। আজ বুধবার দুপুর সোয়া ১২টার দিকে ঢাকা বিশ্ববিদ্যালয়ের ভিসির বাসভবনের সামনে জড়ো হয়ে হল না ছাড়ার ঘোষণা দেন...

title: অনির্দিষ্টকালের জন্য বন্ধ শাবিপ্রবির শিক্ষাকার্যক্রম
content: চলমান উদ্ভূত পরিস্থিতিতে বিশ্ববিদ্যালয়ের সব ধরনের শিক্ষাকার্যক্রম বন্ধসহ সব আবাসিক হল বন্ধের ঘোষণা দিয়েছে শাহজালাল বিজ্ঞান ও প্রযুক্তি বিশ্ববিদ্যালয় কর্তৃপক্ষ।আজ বুধবার (১৭ জুলাই) দুপুর ৩টার মধ্যে সব আবাসিক শিক্ষার্থীকে হল ছাড়ার নির্দেশনা দেওয়া হয়েছে। তবে বিশ্ববিদ্যালয়ের উন্নয়ন সংশ্লিষ্ট বিভিন্ন কাজ চলমান থাকায় অফিস খোলা থাকবে। আজ সকাল ১০টায় বিশ্ববিদ্যালয়ের এক জরুরি সিন্ডিকেট সভায় এ সিদ্ধান্ত গৃহীত হয়েছে বলে এক বিজ্ঞপ্তিতে এ তথ্য জানিয়েছে কর্তৃপক্ষ।বিশ্ববিদ্যালয়ের প্রশাসনিক...

title: ফ্যাকাসে-শীতল মৃহদেহ জড়িয়ে এক ফিলিস্তিনি বাবার আর্তনাদ
content: গাজায় গ্রীষ্মের প্রচণ্ড তাপ থাকা সত্ত্বেও মৃত ফিলিস্তিনি শিশুটির হাত-পা-সহ পুরো দেহটি ফ্যাকাসে আর ঠাণ্ডা। হাসপাতালের বাইরে বাবা তার মৃত ছেলেকে জড়িয়ে ধরে বসে আছেন। বিদায় জানাতে অক্ষম বা অনিচ্ছুক সেই বাবা। মৃত ছেলেটার পাশে উড়ছে মাছি। এমন মর্মান্তিক দৃশ্য গাজায় এখন সাধারণ দৃশ্য হয়ে পড়েছে। ইসরায়েলি হামলায় সন্তান হারিয়ে হতবাক হাজার হাজার বাবা-মা।মৃত সেই শিশুটির বাবার নাম মাহমুদ মিকদাদ। তিনি চিৎকার করে বলছিলেন, ‘সে কী দোষ করেছে, হে ঈশ্বর? সে কী ভুল করেছে?’ আকাশের দিকে মুখ তুলে কর্কশ...

title: ಹೊನ್ನಾವರ | ಬೇಸಿಗೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಜೆಸಿಬಿ ಮೊರೆತ: ಮಳೆಗಾಲದಲ್ಲಿ ಗುಡ್ಡ ಕುಸಿತ!

content: ಹೊನ್ನಾವರ : ಮಳೆಗಾಲ ಕಾಲಿಟ್ಟ ನಂತರ ರಸ್ತೆಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಗುಡ್ಡ ಕುಸಿದು ಸಂಚಾರಕ್ಕೆ ವ್ಯತ್ಯಯ ಉಂಟಾಗುವ ಘಟನೆಗಳು ತಾಲ್ಲೂಕಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರತಿನಿತ್ಯ ನಡೆಯುತ್ತಿವೆ. ಗುಡ್ಡ ಹಾಗೂ ಭೂ ಕುಸಿತ ಸಾರ್ವಜನಿಕ ವಲಯದಲ್ಲಿ ತೀವ್ರ ಆತಂಕಕ್ಕೆ ಕಾರಣವಾಗಿದ್ದು, ಈ ಘಟನೆಗಳಿಗೆ ‘ಭೂ ಮಾಫಿಯಾ’ ಹಾಗೂ ಅದಕ್ಕೆ ಬೆನ್ನೆಲುಬಾಗಿ ನಿಂತ ಆಡಳಿತ ಯಂತ್ರ ಕಾರಣ ಎಂಬ ಆರೋಪ ಜನರಿಂದ ಕೇಳಿಬರುತ್ತಿದೆ. ಕಳೆದ ವರ್ಷ ಮಳೆಗಾಲದಲ್ಲಿ ಆರೋಳ್ಳಿ, ಅಪ್ಸರಕೊಂಡ, ಗುಡ್ಡೆಬಾಳ, ಕೊಳಗದ್ದೆ ಮೊದಲಾದೆಡೆಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಗುಡ್ಡ ಕುಸಿತ ಆಗಿತ್ತು. ಈ ಬಾರಿ ಅಪ್ಸರಕೊಂಡ, ಯಲಗುಪ್ಪ, ಮಸುಕಲ್ಮಕ್ಕಿ, ಭಾಸ್ಕೇರಿ, ಉಪ್ಪೋಣಿ, ಜಲವಳ್ಳಿ ಮೊದಲಾದ ಕಡೆಗಳಲ್ಲಿ...

title: Has A U-2 Dragon Lady Spy Plane Ever Been Shot Down?
creator: Vyte Klisauskaite
content: In service since 1956, the has a long and storied history, with successful reconnaissance missions and its fair share of incidents. Built to snoop on the Soviets, the aircraft and its operators have found themselves on dangerous missions throughout the type's almost 70-year operational history—not only in the territory of the former Soviet Union but also in Korea, Afghanistan, the Balkans, and China. title: Martin Hannan: People always want more, just ask Gareth Southgate

title: OUR VIEWPOINT: Pro-business policy deserves share of responsibility
creator: MICHAEL MORRIS michael.morris@thefacts.com
content: As we covered in this space last week, all the criticism being leveled at the response to Hurricane Beryl by Brazoria County’s main two power providers is well-deserved. The apparent lack of preparation and abysmal communication with affected customers is inexcusable. They are, however, not the only ones to blame. They did not create an environment where putting dollars ahead of people is acceptable and encouraged.

title: No, Donald Trump was not shot in the chest at rally
content: AAP FACTCHECK – Donald Trump was shot in the chest and survived because he was wearing a bulletproof vest, according to posts circulating on social media. This is false. title: 陝西暴雨—目擊者指寶雞逾20車被沖走 今啟四級防汛應急響應—有片
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 陝西寶雞昨日大暴雨引發山洪暴發,有目擊者指當地有逾20輛汽車被洪水沖走,幸未有傷亡報告。受內澇影響,國家防總今早9時,對陝西啟動防汛四級應急響應,截至目前,今日途經寶雞火車站的70列列車停運,當地已緊急避險轉移撤離群眾823戶1289人,暫無人員傷亡報告。 相關新聞: 河南暴雨—漯河市降水量全國第一 南陽市水深及腰 四川內江啟動三級防汛應急響應 轉移群眾606人 河北暴雨引發泥漿流 村莊街道變河道有汽車被沖走|有片 重慶15河水位超警戒線 至少6死此前失蹤3人已遇難 長江上游將遇洪水 三峽今年首洩洪 洞庭決口合龍—華容縣垸區滯留水量若15個西湖 專家估逾10日排清 據央視新聞報道,暴雨影響,流經陝西省寶雞市的石壩河及其支流瓦峪河漲水漫堤,導致寶雞市市區部分區域出現內澇。截至目前,今日途經寶雞火車站的70列列車停運,包括T7、K245、K306、Z274次等列車。目前,當地已緊急避險轉移撤離群眾823戶1289人,暫無人員傷亡報告。...

title: Proposed amendments to Infectious Disease Act strengthen public health safety
content: THE 2nd reading of the Infectious Disease Act 342 amendments saw a few changes. This Act, which started back in April 1989, saw some changes to deter and mitigate the transmission of infectious diseases, uphold authority to trained and empowered healthcare staff in managing and controlling infectious diseases, and protect the public’s health in cases of infectious disease transmission, most likely in the event of an outbreak (including epidemics and pandemics). The changes are timely and...

title: Биков към предложението на ПП-ДБ: Няма ли живот извън съдебната система
creator: Мария Атанасова
content: Ние винаги сме призовавали за диалог. Сега няма как да откажем на ПП-ДБ, въпреки че само преди месец те ни отказаха. title: Infant mauled to death by stray dogs in Hyderabad
content: Listen to Story An 18-month-old boy died after allegedly being mauled by a pack of stray dogs in Jawahar Nagar near here, police said on Wednesday. The incident occurred on Tuesday night when the boy came out of his house and a dog dragged him to some distance and later some strays bit him resulting in injuries, they said. title: 強積金次季資金流入意外回落 較近5年平均少13% 美股基金仍最受捧
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 強積金(MPF)研究機構積金評級估算,今年第二季強積金資金淨流入意外回落至約117.7億元,比過去5年的季度平均水平低約10%,亦較過去5年的第二季平均數字亦低約13%。此外,美國股票基金繼續是最受歡迎的強積金資產類別,反觀中港股票基金資金流仍落後。 積金評級主席叢川普(Francis Chung)表示,強積金資金流顯示了一個相互矛盾的趨勢,因為第二季資金淨流入意外回落下,強積金總資產卻創歷史新高。但他解釋,資金淨流入反映就業情況,而自願性供款、永久離開香港和提早退休等因素都可能影響短期資金淨流入數據,很難確定確切的因素。 截至6月底,強積金總資產約1.226萬億元,按季增約429億元,上半年則增約853億元;相當於每位強積金成員平均賬戶結餘約25.79萬元,按季升約9,000元,上半年則升約17,900元。至於強積金第二季投資回報估算約2.62%,上半年回報則約5.16%。...

title: UK inflation steady but price pressures stay strong
creator: William Schomberg
content: British inflation held at two per cent in June, defying forecasts for a slight fall, and underlying price pressures persisted, maintaining uncertainty about the date of the Bank of England's first interest rate cut since 2020. Economists polled by Reuters had mostly expected headline consumer price inflation would ease to 1.9 per cent in the 12 months to June, extending its drop from a peak of 11.1 per cent in October 2022. Inflation for services was much stronger at 5.7 per cent, the Office...

title: Indian national among 6 people killed in Oman mosque shooting
creator: PTI
content: An Indian national was among six people killed in a rare shooting attack by Islamic State militant group near a Shia Muslim mosque in Oman's capital. The shooting on Monday night near the Imam Ali Mosque also claimed the lives of one policeman and four Pakistan nationals, while injuring 28 others.

Haziran ayında, mevduat faizi, borsa, altın ve döviz gibi yatırım araçlarına göre daha fazla kazanç sağladı. Mevduat faiz oranlarının enflasyonun üzerinde getiri sağlaması dikkat çekiyor. title: ASML beats Q2 earnings forecasts; bookings rise on AI demand
content: By Toby Sterling and Nathan Vifflin AMSTERDAM: ASML , the world's biggest chipmaking equipment supplier, reported better-than-expected second-quarter earnings on Wednesday on strong sales to China and with higher new bookings than the first quarter. ASML reported net income of 1.6 billion euros ($1.74 billion) on revenue of 6.2 billion euros for the quarter ended June 30. Analysts had expected 1.41 billion euros on revenue of 6.04 billion euros, according to LSEG data. The Dutch company's new...

title: В Туапсе возбудили уголовное дело из-за антисанитарии в детском лагере
content: Как выяснилось, в детском оздоровительном лагере, который расположен в селе Лермонтово Туапсинского района, дети находились в ненадлежащих условиях. По словам родителей отдыхающих, в комнатах была грязь и паутина, а в столовой - антисанитария. Следователи вместе с сотрудниками территориального отдела управления Роспотребнадзора осмотрели место происшествия и допросили работников. content: Eine Gruppe vietnamesischer Touristen checkt in ein bekanntes Luxushotel in Thailand ein. Nun sind sechs von ihnen tot. title: 26-year-old missing in Majorca for a week as mum prepares to fly out
creator: bristolpostnews@localworld.co.uk (James Holt, Neil Shaw)
content: A 26-year-old man from the UK has gone missing while on holiday in Majorca. Benjamin Ross, from Golborne, has not been seen since speaking to his mum on July 10, reports MEN . Ben went to Majorca in June to visit a friend then decided to stay, moving into rented accommodation after finding a job. But he has not spoken to his friend for a week. title: Allianz plans to buy majority stake in Singapore's Income Insurance
content: FRANKFURT: Germany's Allianz said on Wednesday that it was planning to buy a majority stake in Singapore's Income Insurance for about $1.6 billion to strengthen its foothold in Asia. The offer by Allianz for a stake of at least 51% comes as the insurance sector in Singapore is experiencing consolidation and increased deal activity. Allianz said it would offer $40.58 Singapore dollars per share for a transaction value of 2.2 billion Singapore dollars ($1.64 billion). Allianz said the move would...

title: പരീക്ഷയില്ലാതെ റെയിൽവേയിൽ ജോലി നേടാം, യോഗ്യത പത്താം ക്ലാസ്; ഉടൻ അപേക്ഷിക്കൂ
content: സെൻട്രൽ റെയിൽവേ റിക്രൂട്ട്‌മെന്റ് സെൽ വിവിധ ട്രേഡുകളിലെ അപ്രന്റിസ് തസ്‌തികകളിലേക്ക് വിജ്ഞാപനം പുറത്തിറക്കി. ഔദ്യോഗിക വെബ്‌സൈറ്റായ rrccr.comൽ ഓൺലൈനായി വേണം അപേക്ഷിക്കാൻ. ജോലിയുമായി ബന്ധപ്പെട്ട വിശദാംശങ്ങൾ സൈറ്റിൽ ലഭ്യമാണ്. താൽപ്പര്യമുള്ളവർ ഓഗസ്റ്റ് 15ന് മുമ്പ് അപേക്ഷകൾ സമർപ്പിക്കണം. ആകെ 2,424 ഒഴിവുകളാണുള്ളത്. സർക്കാർ ജോലി നേടാൻ ആഗ്രഹിക്കുന്ന പത്താം ക്ലാസ് യോഗ്യതയുള്ളവർക്കുള്ള ഏറ്റവും മികച്ച അവസരമാണിത്. അപേക്ഷകൾ സമർപ്പിക്കുന്നതിന് മുമ്പ് വിജ്ഞാപനവുമായി ബന്ധപ്പെട്ട വിവരങ്ങൾ വിശദമായി വായിക്കുക....

title: State pensioners owed £23,000 payouts from DWP after 'fighting for years'
creator: newsdesk@birminghamlive.co.uk (James Rodger)
content: Women are fighting for EIGHT YEARS to get £23,000 state pension payouts, it has emerged. Mary was handed a £23,000 lump sum after being cheated out of the right payments for years. Some 100,000 other women are also affected. Mary Cunningham told the Times newspaper this week she "spent hours on the phone trying to get some answers" until the Department for Work and Pensions ( DWP ) finally admitted that she was right and paid her £23,000. So với năm nay, điểm trung bình của địa phương có tăng nhưng không đáng kể. Cùng nhóm điểm thấp với Hà Giang năm nay là các địa phương như: Đăk Nông (6,16 điểm), Điện Biên (6,14 điểm); Đăk Lăk (6,12 điểm); Cao Bằng (6,03 điểm). content: మేడ్చల్ జవహర్‌నగర్‌లో వీది కుక్కల దాడిలో చిన్నారి ప్రాణాలు కోల్పోయిన ఘటనపై సీఎం రేవంత్ విచారణ వ్యక్తం చేశారు. ఈ ఘటన తనను చాలా కలిచివేసిందన్నారు. వీధి కుక్కల దాడుల నివారణకు తక్షణమే చర్యలు చేపట్టాలని అధికారులను ఆదేశించారు. భవిష్యత్తులో ఇలాంటి ఘటనలు జరగకుండా చర్యలు తీసుకోవాలన్నారు.

title: Big setback for Ajit Pawar, several senior leaders quit NCP, rejoin Sharad Pawar party
content: Ajit Pawar's NCP faced a significant setback as several leaders from Pimpri Chinchwad, including local chief Ajit Gavhane, joined Sharad Pawar's faction in Pune. Gavhane, who resigned from his position and submitted his resignation to party president Sunil Tatkare, was joined by two former corporators. Gavhane noted differences in the development work carried out by the BJP in the Pimpri-Chinchwad Municipal Corporation compared to that by Ajit and Sharad Pawar.

title: "ההחלטה הגאו-פוליטית הגרועה בכל הזמנים": התגובות ברשת למעבר פטריק בברלי להפועל תל אביב
creator: מערכת ספורט היום
content: האזרחים בארצות הברית ידועים בכך שיש להם דעה על כל דבר, אז מה הפלא שהמעבר של פטריק בברלי להפועל תל אביב הסעיר לא רק את הצייצנים הישראלים, אלא גם את אלו שמעבר לים, במיוחד אלו שנגד ישראל. ההחתמה הגדולה סוקרה בין היתר ברשת ESPN וגם ב'Bleacher Report', כשהגולשים לא נותרו אדישים בכלל. התגובה שזכתה להכי הרבה לייקים הייתה "נחמד מצד פטריק בברלי לבוא לבנות מחדש את עזה עם כל הלבנים שיזרוק", בהתייחס להחטאות שלו מחוץ לקשת. הרבה תגובות התייחסו לשיקום עזה בזכותם, אבל היו גם כאלה שהתייחסו למצב עצמו בצורה...

title: נשיא סטיאווה בוקרשט מזלזל: "צריכים להגיד תודה שקיבלנו את מכבי תל אביב"
creator: מערכת ספורט היום
content: סטיאווה בוקרשט העפילה אמש (שלישי) סופית לסיבוב המוקדמות השני של ליגת האלופות לאחר ניצחון 0:4 מול אלופת סן מרינו וירטוס (1:7 במשחק הראשון). במשחק הראשון בשלב הבא שיתקיים ביום שלישי, תגיע לרומניה מכבי תל אביב ובמועדון חלוקים לקראת המשחק. "מכבי קבוצה חזקה אבל אנחנו יכולים לעבור אותה", אמר מאמן הרומנים אליאס חרלאמבוס בסיום הניצחון, "הם מסודרים ומאורגנים". שחקן הקבוצה מלקולם אדיומה הוסיף: "אנחנו יכולים להגיע לשלב הבתים אבל מחכה לנו יריבה טובה מאוד". מי שפחות התחבר לקו הצנוע הזה הוא נשיא אלופת רומניה...

title: போதை குறைந்த மதுவை ஆன்லைனில் விற்க திட்டமா?- தமிழக அரசு விளக்கமளிக்க ராமதாஸ் கோரிக்கை
creator: செய்திப்பிரிவு
content: சென்னை : “குறைந்த அளவில் ஆல்கஹால் கொண்ட மதுவகைகளை சொமாட்டோ, ஸ்விக்கி, பிக்பேஸ்கட் போன்ற ஆன்லைன் விநியோக நிறுவனங்கள் மூலமாக வீடுகளுக்கே கொண்டு சென்று விற்க தமிழக அரசு திட்டமிட்டிருப்பதாக செய்திகள் வந்துள்ளன. வீடுகளுக்கே சென்று மது விற்க திட்டமிடப்பட்டுள்ளதா? என்பது குறித்து தமிழக அரசு விளக்கமளிக்க வேண்டும்.” என்று பாமக நிறுவனர் ராமதாஸ் கோரிக்கை விடுத்துள்ளார். இதுதொடர்பாக ராமதாஸ் வெளியிட்ட சமூகவலைதளப் பதிவில், “தமிழகத்தில் பீர், ஒயின், மணமூட்டப்பட்ட மதுவகைகள் போன்ற குறைந்த அளவில்...

title: Elon Musk Net Worth 2024: How Much Money Does He Make?

title: Border arrests plunge 29% in June
content: SAN DIEGO — Arrests for illegally crossing the border from Mexico plunged 29% in June, the lowest month of Joe Biden's presidency, according to new figures that provide another window on the impact of a new rule to temporarily suspend asylum. Arrests totaled 83,536 in June, down from 117,901 in May to mark the lowest tally since January 2021, U.S. Customs and Border Protection said Monday. A seven-day average of daily arrests fell more than half by the end of June from Biden's announcement on...

title: 首爾「極限暴雨」|清溪川暴漲電車停駛 撐傘也濕透
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 隨着滯留鋒面逐漸北移,南韓首爾、京畿道北部17日降下200年一遇的「極限暴雨」,光是坡州市的時雨量就超過100毫米、板門店累積降雨達到342毫米,首爾站、汝矣島站、江南站的上班族撐傘也沒用,出門1分鐘即全身濕透。各地傳來道路與住宅淹水等災情,地鐵和電車也因豪雨停駛。 相關新聞: 多倫多暴雨創歷史紀錄 洪水封城逾16萬戶停電|有片 河南暴雨—漯河市降水量全國第一 南陽市水深及腰 土耳其男女暴雨下涉水觸電斃命 裸露電線無人理釀禍|有片 遊日注意 | 九州暴雨新幹線區間停駛 當局籲24萬人避難 據韓聯社報道,南韓首都圈17日上午開始降下暴雨,雨勢明顯集中在首爾、京畿道北部,南韓氣象廳今年以來首次針對首都圈發布豪雨緊急災難警告簡訊,從清晨4時24分至上午9時40分一連發送20次,京畿道議政府市中浪川河濱停車場水位上漲,可見此次雨勢來得又急又快。 氣象廳統計指出,從15日下午5時至17日上午11時,京畿道坡州市板門店累積降雨達到342.5毫米、南楊州市倉峴里202毫米、漣川郡長南面181.5毫米、楊州市南面189毫米、首爾市蘆原區159.5毫米。...

title: 肩頸痛用止痛貼也有副作用?照紅外線燈越久越好?忽略5件事恐更痛更傷
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 肩頸膊痛是常見都市病,疼痛難當時,有人會服用止痛藥、貼止痛膏布,甚至是照紅外線燈。不過,本港消委會提醒,若紓緩方法不當,有機會引發副作用或受傷。若忽略5件事,恐致皮膚出紅疹、水泡、灼傷,有反效果。 除了口服止痛藥,也有不少人選擇外用的止痛藥膏、藥貼。 消委會 在《選擇月刊》指出,若使用不當,外用止痛藥亦可能會引發系統性的副作用,甚至影響其他器官。 【同場加映】 肩頸背不同部位 反映不同健康問題 家用紅外線燈是紓緩肩頸痛的另一種方法。甚麼是紅外線治療?消委會講解如下: 消委會提醒,紅外線燈照射的距離愈近,溫度便會愈高,如身體過度靠近紅外線治療燈,極容易出現灼傷。因此家用紅外線燈更適合用於以熱療溫度(介乎40°C至45°C)舒緩肩頸痠痛。 消委會指出,紅外線燈的照射距離、角度、面積都會影響其成效,使用是否夠安全。一般而言,紅外線垂直照射肩頸痠痛患處,會讓該位置皮膚得到最多的能量,效能較好。 1. 照射距離 2. 使用時間、次數 3. 勿塗潤膚液/藥膏/按摩油 4. 避開眼部 資料來源: 《選擇月刊》第559期 ----- 相關文章: 高血壓|50歲港男常頭痛肩頸痛 確診高血壓揭1姿勢所致...

content: [서울=뉴시스]조재완 신재현 기자 = 우원식 국회의장이 17일 여야 간 '방송4법' 협의를 위한 범국민협의체를 구성해 합의안을 도출하자고 제안했다. 정부여당에는 방송통신위원회 정상화 조치를 요구했고, 야당에는 입법 강행 방침을 중단하고 법안을 여당과 원점 재검토하라고 요청했다. 이에 따라 오는 18일 본회의는 사실상 무산됐고 25일에도 본회의가 열리지 않을 가능성이 커 보인다. 우 의장은 이날 오후 국회 본청에서 긴급 기자회견을...

title: Иран намерен добиваться суда над виновными в убийстве генерала Сулеймани
content: Иран будет добиваться суда над виновными в убийстве генерала Сулеймани - и. о. главы МИД о якобы планах Тегерана совершить покушение на Трампа. Новость дополняется.

title: LeBron, 39, still center of attention
creator: TIM REYNOLDS AP Basketball Writer
content: LAS VEGAS — This is how the U.S. Olympic men's basketball team took the floor for warmups before an exhibition game in Abu Dhabi: Stephen Curry opened with a layup, followed by ones from Tyrese Haliburton, Anthony Edwards and Derrick White, and then a short jumper from Devin Booker. All were met with some cheers. And then LeBron James got the ball in his hands. The crowd got louder immediately, the volume rising until his dunk was met with the loudest roar the arena could muster. "He's still...

title: The president's people
content: I understand that the president is the person at the top of the governing pyramid, so to speak, but it's just as important who he has beneath and with him. President Biden has great people in his Cabinet: Antony Blinken, Pete Buttegieg, Janet Yellen, Lloyd Austin and Merrick Garland, to name a few. You've heard their names and the impressive work they have been doing for our country. President Biden made great calls in choosing these people and their work on his behalf, for our country, even in...

title: All-Star game ushers in break
creator: DOUG FEINBERG AP Basketball Writer
content: NEW YORK — The WNBA heads into its monthlong Olympic break following this weekend's highly anticipated All-Star festivities. The Olympic team's matchup with Team WNBA featuring Caitlin Clark and Angel Reese will be one of the toughest games the American squad will potentially play over the month. In 2021, the WNBA All-Star team beat Team USA behind the MVP performance of Arike Ogunbowale. It was the only loss the Americans had en route to winning their seventh straight gold medal. "We will not...

title: An American tradition
content: I read with interest the letter from Larry Kirwan in today's paper ("Not the way," July 16). I must disagree with his assertion that the assassination attempt on President Trump "was un-American." Just from memory I can think of a long bipartisan list of politicians who were targets of assassination attempts: President Abraham Lincoln, President John Kennedy, President Ronald Reagan, ex-President Donald Trump, Attorney General Robert Kennedy, Alabama Gov. George Wallace, U.S. Reps. Steve...

title: Questions for voters
content: In this deeply divided time many of us fear for our country. We are bombarded by clashing, disturbing messages with every campaign ad and with coverage of political events. As we consider whom to select as president of our beloved country, we must remember much more than simply the individuals whose names are on the ballot. We are not just choosing between two people, perhaps neither of whom is our preferred choice. First, we are choosing between two very different hopes and visions for our...

title: Rockingham nears revival — with or without NASCAR
creator: ALEX ZIETLOW Tribune News Service
content: Ronnie Rollins still remembers scaling one of the cluster of pine trees just outside Rockingham's most vaunted venue and climbing high enough so he could see. It was October 1965, and the then-21-year-old Rollins didn't have the $10 to secure a ticket to the speedway's inaugural NASCAR Cup Series race. Neither did his buddies. So the group of them walked around just outside the backstretch of then-named North Carolina Motor Speedway and watched Curtis Turner, the popular but aging driver, steal...

title: J.D. Vance is red meat for Trump's base
content: J.D. Vance once called Donald rump "America's Hitler," likening him to "cultural heroin." On Monday, the Ohio senator was named the former president's running mate. It's a shrewd and calculated pick — a nod to Trump's base. More than any of the other contenders, Vance's selection shows that Trump wants to lock down the MAGA faithful and ensure they turn out — even if that means losing more moderate and independent voters. Vance's rhetoric is at times harsher and hotter than Trump's and his...

title: Penske on a hot streak
creator: DAN GELSTON — Associated Press
content: LONG POND, PA. — Ryan Blaney popped some bubbly and hopped off a stage in victory lane so he could spray it at all the fans who stuck around to celebrate on a steamy day at Pocono Raceway. They might need to bust open a few more bottles of the good stuff at Team Penske. Moments after Blaney slid out of his No. 12 Ford after he secured his second Cup Series win in five weeks, the 2023 NASCAR champion learned that Will Power won the IndyCar race for Team Penske at Iowa Speedway. Penske driver...

title: Bears sign first-round picks
creator: ANDREW SELIGMANAP Sports Writer
content: CHICAGO — The Chicago Bears locked in their top two rookies on Tuesday, agreeing to fouryear contracts with No. 1 overall draft pick Caleb Williams and No. 9 selection Rome Odunze and avoiding any training camp drama with their prized quarterback and receiver. A person familiar with the deal confirmed the agreement with Williams to The Associated Press. The person spoke on the condition of anonymity because the team has not announced the contract. Williams gets a slotted $39.49 million fully...

title: Mahomes: Chiefs can be even better
creator: ASSOCIATED PRESS
content: ST. JOSEPH, Mo. — Patrick Mahomes is bringing along a TV to training camp at Missouri Western for the first time in his NFL career. Two reasons: He wants to watch the upcoming Paris Olympics and play the new EA Sports College Football 25 video game. Whether there is time for any of that remains to be seen. Mahomes joined rookies and select veterans in reporting to camp Tuesday, a little more than five months after the Chiefs beat the 49ers for their second consecutive Super Bowl. And with their...

title: Old Dominion ranks 15th among US midsize companies
VinFast delays launch of Sanford EV plant
content: North Carolina's decades-long quest for an operational automobile manufacturer will have to wait at least another four years before production commences. VinFast Auto Ltd., a Vietnamese-based electric vehicle startup, confirmed late last week the start of production at its Sanford manufacturing facility will be delayed until 2028. The manufacturer announced to great fanfare in March 2022 plans for a $4 billion campus within a 1,977-acre megasite. The Moncure megasite, branded as Triangle...

title: Settlement selects local beneficiaries
content: A proposed legal settlement involving Atrium Health and the trust for an heir to the Cannon Mills Co. textile fortune has its Wake Forest Baptist Medical Center affiliate being designated as a beneficiary. Also sharing in a potential 50% beneficiary distribution is Wake Forest University Health Sciences. The motion to approve the settlement agreement, filed July 8 with the N.C. Business Court, does not disclose other potential beneficiaries. The trust fund amount has not been listed in any...

title: Players pay a price for bad driving
creator: RALPH D. RUSSOCollege Football Writer
content: DALLAS — Georgia players who have been arrested or cited for driving violations have been disciplined with suspensions and fines through the collective that provides name, image and likeness payments to the school's athletes, coach Kirby Smart said Tuesday. Football players at the school have been involved in 24 driving-related violations (DUI, reckless driving or speeding), The Atlanta-Journal Constitution has reported, including a crash that killed a player and a recruiting staffer in January...

title: Philipsen wins stage race
creator: ASSOCIATED PRESS
content: NIMES, France — Jasper Philipsen completed a hat trick of stage wins at this year's Tour de France after Biniam Girmay — his main rival for the best sprinter's green jersey — crashed near the finish Tuesday. There was no major change in the general classification with two-time champion Tadej Pogacar keeping the overall lead. Philipsen was perfectly led out by his Alpecin-Deceuninck teammates in the last kilometer of the 16th stage leading the peloton to Nimes, and he comfortably won the mass...

title: Switch-pitcher Cijntje drafted by Mariners
content: Jurrangelo Cijntje wants to keep his options open with the Seattle organization as a pitcher who switches between throwing right-handed and left-handed. Cijntje was the 15th overall pick by the Mariners in MLB's amateur draft out of Mississippi State. Cijntje threw right-handed to lefties more often in 2024 but said it was because of discomfort in his left side. The Mariners say they want Cijntje to decide how to proceed as a righty and/or lefty as a pro. He says he wants to continue pitching...

title: All-Star Game may return to club uniforms
content: MLB will consider going back to having players wear their team uniforms for the All-Star Game. Club uniforms were used by the American League from 19332019 and by the National League from 1934-2019. When the game resumed in 2021 following the pandemic-related cancellation in 2020, MLB started a uniform contract with Nike and Fanatics, and All-Stars were outfitted in specially designed league uniforms. — Associated Press Get local news delivered to your inbox!

title: Menendez found guilty
content: NEW YORK NEW YORK — U.S. Sen. Bob Menendez was convicted Tuesday on all counts at his corruption trial, including accepting bribes of gold and cash from three New Jersey businessmen and acting as a foreign agent for the Egyptian government. Prosecutors said the Democrat abused the power of his office to protect allies from criminal investigations and enrich associates, including his wife, through acts that included meeting with Egyptian intelligence officials and helping that country access...

title: Robo umpires could be tested next spring
content: MLB could test robot umpires as part of a challenge system in spring training next year, which could lead to regular-season use in 2026. Manfred said the sport has made "material progress" during testing at Triple-A, the highest minor league level. Manfred said a spring training test would be needed a year before the system is adopted at the major league level. Get local news delivered to your inbox!

title: Group of Dems want to stop early nomination
content: WASHINGTON — A contingent of House Democrats is wary of swiftly nominating President Joe Biden as the party's pick for reelection, circulating a letter Tuesday raising "serious concerns" about plans for a virtual roll call as soon as July 21, ahead of the Democratic National Convention in August. The letter to the Democratic National Committee, which had not yet been sent, says it would be a "terrible idea" to stifle debate about the party's nominee with the early roll call vote. "It could...

title: Dam fails in the wake of storms
content: SEVERE WEATHER CHICAGO — Hundreds of people in a southern Illinois town were ordered to evacuate Tuesday as water rolled over the top of a dam, just one perilous result of severe weather that raged through the Midwest overnight with relentless rain and tornadoes and hit the Chicago area especially hard. Hundreds of thousands of people lost power, and even weather forecasters had to briefly scramble for safety. A woman in Indiana died after a tree fell on a home Monday night. Water overtopped a...

title: Skenes retires Kwan, Henderson and Judge
content: ARLINGTON, Texas — Paul Skenes became the fifth rookie to start an All-Star Game, retiring Steven Kwan, Gunnar Henderson and Aaron Judge for the National League in a hitless first inning. He walked Juan Soto. The 22-year-old Pirates right-hander threw seven fastballs of up to 100.1 mph, seven splinkers of up to 94.4 mph, one curveball and one slider. He threw 11 of 16 pitches for strikes, starting all four batters with strikes. Get local news delivered to your inbox!

title: MLB players may compete in '28 Olympics
content: ARLINGTON, Texas — MLB players participating in the 2028 Los Angeles Olympics remains a possibility, according to Manfred, though many obstacles remain to Shohei Ohtani, Aaron Judge and Bryce Harper playing for a gold medal. Baseball was a medal sport from 1992 to 2008, then was dropped until the 2021 Tokyo Games, when MLB allowed the participation only of players not on 40-man rosters. Even then, many eligible prospects were blocked by their clubs from playing. Baseball was dropped for this...

title: Pride Night a non-factor for All-Star Game
content: The Texas Rangers being the only MLB team not to hold a Pride Night was not a decisive factor when the commissioner's office picked the team to host this year's All-Star Game. "There are a whole host of factors that go into deciding who's going to get an All-Star Game, and I don't view whether you have a Pride Night or not as a outcome-determinative issue," commissioner Rob Manfred said before Tuesday night's game at Globe Life Field, which opened in 2020. Baseball often uses the All-Star Game...

title: Immigration on agenda for RNC's second day
content: MILWAUKEE — Immigration took center stage as the Republican National Convention resumed Tuesday, with speakers spotlighting a key element of former President Donald Trump's political brand that helped endear him to the GOP base. Among speakers slated for Tuesday night were families who were impacted by violent crime — part of a GOP strategy to link crime and border policies. Peer-reviewed academic studies generally find no link between immigration and violent crime, though conclusions vary....

title: Reynolds hidden behind Skenes hoopla
creator: TRIBUNE NEWS SERVICE
content: ARLINGTON, Texas — Hiding behind the Paul Skenes hoopla is only the Pittsburgh Pirates' highest-paid player in history. While Skenes has commanded a plethora of headlines for starting the AllStar Game for the National League, Bryan Reynolds was also on hand for the festivities at Globe Life Field. It officially marked the second time that Reynolds attended an All-Star Game as a player, previously doing so in 2021 alongside teammate Adam Frazier. The typically reserved Reynolds was appreciative...

title: Iranian threat prompted boost to Trump security
content: WASHINGTON — A threat from Iran prompted the U.S. Secret Service to boost protection around Donald Trump before Saturday's attempted assassination of the former president, though it appears unrelated to the rally attack, two U.S. officials said this week. Upon learning of the threat, the Biden administration reached out to senior officials at the Secret Service to make them aware, the officials said, adding it was shared with the lead agent on Trump's protection detail and the Trump campaign....

title: Witt solidifies place among stars
creator: TRIBUNE NEWS SERVICE
content: Kansas City Royals shortstop Bobby Witt Jr. opened a lot of eyes with his performance in the 2024 T-Mobile Home Run Derby on Monday night. Witt, who returned as the hometown hero in Arlington, Texas, solidified his rightful place among the top young stars of Major League Baseball. And he did it with his family in attendance. "Yeah, that was fun," Witt said. "The crowd, Texas-sized crowd, it was a lot of fun being able to just do that and experience that with my brother-in-law and family in the...

title: Gaza strikes kill dozens, including in 'safe zone'
content: DEIR AL-BALAH, Gaza Strip — Israeli airstrikes killed more than 60 Palestinians in southern and central Gaza overnight and into Tuesday, including one that struck an Israeli-declared "safe zone" crowded with thousands of displaced people. Airstrikes in recent days brought a constant drumbeat of deaths of Palestinians in the Gaza Strip. Almost daily strikes hit the "safe zone" covering about 23 square miles along the Mediterranean coast, where Israel told fleeing Palestinians to take refuge to...

title: LoL patch 14.15 early notes: Melee assassin and item changes
creator: Liam Ho
content: Patch 14.15 for League of Legends is introducing more changes to the MOBA after Riot’s extended break. This includes alterations to melee assassins like Yasuo, Irelia, and Zed, and further item changes to boots. Riot is back from their break with 14.15. The new patch aims to make several adjustments to the MOBA, including big changes to melee assassins that should shift their power dramatically. Additionally, boots are also getting nerfed across the board. When does League Patch 14.15 go live?...

title: DNC investing $15M in 7 swing states
content: WASHINGTON — Democrats are trying to offer political counterprograming to the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee, announcing $15 million to fund campaign operations in seven key swing states — even as some in the party have urged President Joe Biden to bow out of November's election. The Democratic National Committee announced Tuesday that it is investing $15 million in state parties, meant to help them open more field offices and bolster staffing. The funding will let them add to the...

title: US team plays to draw in heat
creator: STEPHEN WHYNOAP Sports Writer
content: WASHINGTON — The U.S. women's soccer team played to a 0-0 draw with Costa Rica in sweltering temperatures on Tuesday night in its final exhibition tune-up game before the Paris Olympics. It was 98 degrees Fahrenheit at kickoff after Washington tied the hottest day on record in the nation's capital at 104 (40C) hours earlier. Coach Emma Hayes figured it would be a nice test for her players, given the forecast for nearly this level of heat during upcoming games in Marseilles later this month....

title: Self-care tips for new parents
creator: Yejide Gbenga-Ogundare
content: Having a new baby is a joyful experience but it can also be stressful than any other time in a woman’s life. It’s easy to get overwhelmed because a baby’s needs seem endless but to be your best as a parent, you have to take care of yourself, too. You can take the following steps to reduce stress and take care of yourself as a new parent: Good nutrition keeps your energy up and boosts your mood. Get plenty of protein, iron, and omega-3s, and go easy on the sugar. That’s especially important if...

title: F1 team staying with engine provider
content: KANNAPOLIS, N.C. — The Haas Formula 1 team has extended its partnership with engine provider Ferrari until the end of the 2028 season. The U.S.-based Haas team says the deal "provides long-term engine stability" with the next major change in regulations due in 2026. Ferrari has been the only engine provider for Haas since their F1 partnership began in 2016. — Associated Press Get local news delivered to your inbox!

title: Assumption headed to state again
creator: SAMEER MALLAsmalla@qctimes.com
content: Davenport Assumption started strong in the Class 3A, Region 8 championship and defeated Central Lee 6-3 on Tuesday evening to advance to the Class 3A softball state tournament. "This win is huge. It's a great accomplishment," Assumption head coach Tyler Edwards said. "The girls worked hard. We graduated a lot of girls last year and a lot of great players. The great thing about this program is somebody always steps up." That 'somebody' was eighth-grader Sophia Caudle, who went 4-for-4 at the...

title: England's coach steps down after 8 years
content: Gareth Southgate announced he would step down as England manager after eight years in charge. Southgate led England to the final of Euro 2024 where it lost 2-1 to Spain on Sunday. Southgate says "It has meant everything to me, and I have given it my all." But he added "it's time for change." Hired in 2016, Southgate led England to back-to-back finals at the Euros and to the semifinals of the World Cup in 2018. Get local news delivered to your inbox!

title: French file complaint over 'racist' remarks
content: PARIS — The French soccer federation has pledged to file a complaint with FIFA over "racist and discriminatory remarks" by Argentina players in post-match chants about France's team after their Copa America title win. Argentina beat Colombia 1-0 on Sunday. A video posted on Instagram by Argentina midfielder Enzo Fernandez, who plays for Chelsea, and widely viewed on X showed Argentina players appearing to sing about French players with African heritage. One of Fernandez's Chelsea teammates,...

title: NASCAR's Suarez to enter Brazil races
content: CHARLOTTE, N.C. — NASCAR Cup Series driver Daniel Suarez will compete next month in the sanctioning body's Brasil Series Special Edition tournament that runs parallel to its main competition in Brazil. The Cup series will take a two-week break during the Paris Summer Olympics. Suarez will drive a Chevy Camaro on Aug. 2-4 at Autódromo José Carlos Pace, a release stated on Tuesday. The 32-year-old Mexican native will celebrate his wedding to Julia Piquet in Brazil and race in São Paulo before...

title: Colombian official arrested at Copa final
content: MIAMI GARDENS, Fla. — Police say Colombia's soccer federation president and his son were among 27 people arrested during the crowd-control issues that broke out Sunday at the Copa America final between Argentina and Colombia. Miami-Dade police detective Andre Martin told The Associated Press that Ramón Jesurún and his son Ramon Jamil Jesurun were detained and charged with three counts each of felony battery after the event at Hard Rock Stadium. Get local news delivered to your inbox!

title: Nadal returns, beats Bjorn Borg's son
content: BASTAD, Sweden — Rafael Nadal returned to singles action with a 6-3, 6-4 victory on clay over Leo Borg, the 21-year-old son of Swedish great Bjorn Borg, in the first round of the Nordea Open in Bastad. The 38-year old Nadal said it was "a huge honor to play against the son of one of the biggest legends in the history of our sport." Nadal won the singles title in southern Sweden as a 19-year-old in 2005 and this week is his first time back as he prepares for the Olympic tournament on clay at...

title: Vance is relative unknown
content: MILWAUKEE — JD Vance is supposed to help Donald Trump win the Midwest this fall. But almost immediately after the Ohio senator was announced as Trump's vice presidential pick on Monday, one thing became clear: Vance, a 39-year-old Republican with less than two years in Congress, is not well-known among many in his party, even in the swing states Trump hopes he'll deliver. Michigan Republican Party Chairman Pete Hoekstra offered a blunt response when asked about Trump's pick minutes after it was...

title: Season in question for Blues' Krug
content: ST. LOUIS — St. Louis Blues defenseman Torey Krug is in danger of missing the entire 2024-25 NHL season after being diagnosed with pre-arthritic changes in his left ankle. The team announced Tuesday that Krug would work to rehabilitate the injury without surgery over the next six to eight weeks before being reevaluated. If an operation is needed, the 33-year-old would be out for the season. The team says the diagnosis is a cumulative result of a bone fracture earlier in his career. Krug injured...

title: Ex-player Joe Bryant, Kobe's dad, dies
content: PHILADELPHIA — Joe "Jellybean" Bryant, the father of the late Basketball Hall of Famer Kobe Bryant, has died, according to his alma mater, La Salle University. Bryant, who spent eight seasons in the NBA with three different franchises, was 69. Citing La Salle coach Fran Dunphy, The Philadelphia Inquirer reported that Joe Bryant recently had a massive stroke. He was the No. 14 pick by Golden State in the 1975 draft, and the Warriors wound up selling his rights to Philadelphia before the start of...

title: Injury sidelines Messi for MLS play
content: FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla. — Lionel Messi is likely to miss at least the next two matches for his Major League Soccer team Inter Miami after injuring his right ankle Sunday in the Copa America final. Miami coach Gerardo "Tata" Martino says Messi will undergo further testing to determine the severity of the injury. Get local news delivered to your inbox!

title: Islanders re-sign Holmstrom
content: NEW YORK — The New York Islanders signed forward Simon Holmstrom to a one-year contract. Holmstrom, a 23-year-old restricted free agent from Sweden, had 15 goals and 10 assists in 75 games last season. His five short-handed goals and seven short-handed points led the team and ranked second overall in the NHL. The Islanders selected him with the 23rd pick in the 2019 NHL draft. He has 21 goals and 13 assists in 125 NHL games and 27 goals and 43 assists in 154 games with the Islanders' AHL...

title: Hopes high for first Titanic voyage in 14 years
content: PORTLAND, Maine — The company that owns the salvage rights to the Titanic is undertaking its first expedition to the ship's wreckage in years, and those involved in the mission said they have both heavy hearts and lofty goals for a trip happening a year after a submersible disaster involving another firm killed five people. RMS Titanic Inc., a Georgia-based firm, holds the legal rights to salvage the wreck of the ship, which sank in the North Atlantic Ocean in 1912. The company's first...

title: Iowa, Illinois players drafted
creator: STAFF REPORT
content: Iowa left-handed pitcher Cade Obermueller was picked in the 19th round of the MLB draft on Tuesday by the Texas Rangers. The Iowa City High product is coming off a strong season for the Hawkeyes. The 5-foot-11, 190-pounder went 4-3 in 59 2/3 innings. He allowed 39 hits and struck out 73 batters, pitching to an ERA of 3.93. Obemueller, a junior, was taken with the 585th pick. He was listed as 's 214thranked prospect coming into the draft. In 28 career games for the Hawkeyes, Obermueller has gone...

title: McNamara, Lester have 'hit it off'
creator: DAVE SELVIG dselvig@qctimes.com
content: IOWA CITY — Iowa's quarterback and new offensive coordinator are on the same page with the new season approaching. In his first media availability since blowing out his left knee in the fifth game of last season, sixth-year senior Cade McNamara said he's feeling "100%" and is taking to the Hawkeyes' new offense. "Me and coach (Tim) Lester have done nothing but hit it off. He's such a good dude," McNamara said. "We've been able to share a lot of offensive philosophy together. I can tell he...

title: Blue Cross NC will not appeal judge's decision
content: Blue Cross Blue Shield of NC confirmed Monday it will not appeal a state Administrative Hearings judge's decision to uphold the State Health Plan's decision to award its third-party administrator contract for 2025-27 to Aetna. The SHP is North Carolina's largest purchaser of medical and pharmaceutical services. It covers nearly 740,000 teachers, state employees, legislators, retirees and their dependents. The treasurer's office oversees SHP. In December 2022, state Treasurer Dale Folwell...

title: ON JOURNALNOW.COM
Assumption tops Fairfield
creator: STAFF REPORT
content: Assumption scored three runs in the bottom of the first inning and never looked back, beating Fairfield 6-3 in a Class 3A Substate semifinal game on Tuesday night in Eldridge. Ben Hamilton tossed four innings for the Knights, allowing one run on two hits with a pair of strikeouts. Aidan Schmidt earned the save, working the final three innings. David Gartner went 2-for-3 with an RBI for Assumption. Ethan Morris also had two hits, including a double for the Knights, who outhit Fairfield 6-3....

title: Chickens come home to roost on Iowa child labor law
content: In the past week I have read several articles regarding fines being levied by the Department of Labor on Iowa businesses. Those of us who follow the policy actions of the Iowa Legislature are aware that a year ago a bill was passed and signed by Gov. Reynolds loosening some restrictions on child workers. This was done despite notification from the federal Department of Labor that the state statute would conflict with federal laws regarding child labor. Now the chickens have come home to roost...

title: Transfer Olsen fitting right in
creator: DAVE SELVIG dselvig@qctimes.com
content: IOWA CITY — Lucy Olsen, last season's third-leading scorer in the country, has fit right in with the Hawkeyes. The 5-foot-9 guard averaged 23.3 points per game at Villanova — only Hawkeyes legend Caitlin Clark and JuJu Watkins of USC accounted for more. When deciding on where she would play her final season, getting a text from Clark in the recruiting process did not hurt. "It was thrilling," the good-natured Olsen said of hearing from the WNBA All-Star. "I haven't gotten to meet her yet; I'm...

title: Madison man faces murder charges
content: A 24-year-old Madison man has been charged with murder in the death of a 42-year-old Winston-Salem man, the Forsyth County Sheriff 's Office said Tuesday. Sheriff 's deputies responded to the 8000 block of Cain Wood Court in Walkertown at approximately midnight on Tuesday after getting a report about a gun being fired. When deputies arrived, they found Timothy Allen Killion, of Winston-Salem, suffering from a gunshot wound to the face. Killion was taken to Atrium Health Wake Forest Baptist...

title: Drought has 'hit us hard very quickly'
content: July is expected to continue to be dry and hot, leading the Triad to its most severe summertime drought since 2008. While droughts occurring in the fall often mean more wildfires, summertime droughts severely aff ect agriculture and water supplies, causing higher evaporation rates and increased demand on water reservoirs. Already water conservation recommendations are in place in the eastern part of the state. "Drought is usually a pretty slow-developing phenomenon, but it has hit us hard very...

title: Le indagini sui fiancheggiatori di Matteo Messina Denaro: caccia al covo
content: Caccia al covo di Matteo Messina Denaro, il latitante arrestato a gennaio 2023 e morto lo scorso settembre. Sono in corso perquisizioni, disposte della Dda di Palermo, in un complesso residenziale di Mazara del Vallo, un’attività investigativa, svolta dalla polizia e dai carabinieri, che rientra nelle indagini sulla rete dei fiancheggiatori del capomafia. Il provvedimento nasce dagli accertamenti dello Sco che hanno consentito di ricostruire gli spostamenti di Messina Denaro in un'area di...

title: ACCESS GRANTED TO CITY RECORDS
content: Litigants in lawsuits filed against Winston Weaver after 2022's devastating fertilizer plant fire have gotten to see fire investigation files that the city has never shared with the Journal or the public, under a judge's ruling. The ruling gave litigants access to all emergency response, fire origin, arson and criminal investigation records, along with maps or drawings indicating the evacuation area the city set up around the Weaver plant at 4440 N. Cherry St. The parties to the suit have also...

title: America deserves better than MAGA
content: Joe Biden's stumbles in the debate don't in any way lessen the anti-democratic, vengeful and destructive ideology of Donald Trump, MAGA, and the 2025 project. While Mr. Biden's ideas were poorly communicated on stage, they were ideas and positive ones, with the potential to bring benefit to all Americans. Trump obfuscated, repeatedly failed to answer the moderator's questions, told long lists of lies and was unpresidential in his incoherence and truculence. Mr. Biden may not be up to the job,...

title: Food and concert series are not news
content: Front page articles that reminisce about 10 or 20-year-old concerts are not news. They belong on the entertainment page if you consider that type of article entertaining. Articles about what someone ordered at a local eatery, belong on the food page, not page three. Let us have less of these articles and more local and state news stories. Certainly, there is more news from both sides of the river to report on in the Quad Cities rather than who performed at a concert in 2010 or how well someone...

title: Man wounded in Monday night shooting
creator: ANTHONY WATTawatt@qconline.com
content: A Monday night shooting in Rock Island left a 32-year-old man wounded. Off cers responded around 8 p.m. for a report of gunfire in the 3700 block of Fifth Street, according to the Rock Island Police Department. Investigators think someone fired a single shot during a domestic disturbance, striking the man in the torso. Authorities considered the injury life threatening and the man's condition was considered critical as of Tuesday afternoon, the department said. No one else reported any injuries...

title: Jurors find Menendez guilty
creator: LARRY NEUMEISTER AND PHILIP MARCELO Associated Press
content: NEW YORK — U.S. Sen. Bob Menendez was convicted of all charges at his corruption trial Tuesday, including accepting bribes of gold and cash from three businessmen and acting as a foreign agent for the Egyptian government. A jury in Manhattan deliberated for parts of three days before finding him guilty of 16 crimes, including bribery, extortion, honest services fraud, obstruction of justice and conspiracy. Prosecutors said the New Jersey Democrat abused the power of his office to protect allies...

title: Artisans Craft Unique Buddhist Altar for Donald Keene; Urushi Lacquer Artist, Master Builder Combined Their Skills
creator: 井手
content: By Futoshi Mori / Japan News Senior Writer 15:55 JST, July 17, 2024 A unique Buddhist altar with a hexagonal roof sits in a Kita Ward, Tokyo, apartment that for nearly half a century was Donald Keene’s home and base in Japan. Kazumi Murose, 73, an urushi lacquer artist and living national treasure, and Mikihisa Kinoshita, 66, a sukiya-zukuri master builder, created the piece as a posthumous gift for Keene, who introduced the charms of Japanese literature to the world and died in 2019 at age 96....

title: PC emulator comes to iOS, but Apple's restrictions hamper performance
content: One month after PC emulator UTM was rejected from the iOS App Store , the developers have announced that a new "UTM SE" version is now available for free on the App Store . But the app's performance is severely hampered by Apple's restrictions on so-called "just-in-time" (JIT) compilation, limiting the app's suitability for effectively emulating many PC games. title: ਭਾਰਤ ਇਕ ਰਣਨੀਤਕ ਸਾਂਝੇਦਾਰ: ਪੈਂਟਾਗਨ
creator: mukesh
content: ਮਿਲਵਾਉਕੀ, 17 ਜੁਲਾਈ ਭਾਰਤ ਇਕ ਰਣਨੀਤਕ ਸਾਂਝੇਦਾਰ ਹੈ ਅਤੇ ਅਮਰੀਕਾ ਇਸ ਸਾਂਝੇਦਾਰੀ ਨੂੰ ਅੱਗੇ ਵਧਾਉਂਦੇ ਰਹਿਣ ਲਈ ਉਤਸ਼ਾਹਿਤ ਹੈ। ਅਮਰੀਕੀ ਰੱਖਿਆ ਵਿਭਾਗ ਦੇ ਹੈੱਡਕੁਆਰਟਰ ਪੈਂਟਾਗਨ ਨੇ ਇਹ ਗੱਲ ਆਖੀ। ਵਾਸ਼ਿੰਗਟਨ ਵਿੱਚ ਮੰਗਲਵਾਰ ਨੂੰ ਮੀਡੀਆ ਨਾਲ ਗੱਲਬਾਤ ਦੌਰਾਨ ਪੈਂਟਾਗਨ ਦੇ ਪ੍ਰੈੱਸ ਸਕੱਤਰ ਪੈਟ ਰਾਈਡਰ ਨੇ ਇਕ ਸਵਾਲ ਦੇ ਜਵਾਬ ਵਿੱਚ ਕਿਹਾ, ‘‘ਭਾਰਤ ਇਕ ਰਣਨੀਤਕ ਸਾਂਝੇਦਾਰ ਹੈ ਅਤੇ ਅਸੀਂ ਇਸ ਸਾਂਝੇਦਾਰੀ ਨੂੰ ਅੱਗੇ ਵਧਾਉਂਦੇ ਰਹਿਣ ਲਈ ਉਤਸ਼ਾਹਿਤ ਹਾਂ।’’ ਯੂਕਰੇਨ-ਰੂਸ ਜੰਗ ਨਾਲ ਜੁੜੇ ਇਕ ਸਵਾਲ ਦੇ ਜਵਾਬ ਵਿੱਚ ਰਾਈਡਰ ਨੇ ਕਿਹਾ, ‘‘ਗੱਲ ਜਦੋਂ ਯੂਕਰੇਨ ਤੇ ਯੂਕਰੇਨੀ ਖੇਤਰ ’ਤੇ ਰੂਸ ਦੇ ਨਾਜਾਇਜ਼ ਕਬਜ਼ੇ ਤੇ ਹਮਲੇ ਦੀ...

title: 西九財困|政府允西九管理局出售住宅項目 須嚴格遵守多項財務紀律KPI
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 西九文化區管理局面對營運赤字,早前指資金鏈或於明年6月斷裂,西九文化區管理局去年已向政府提交財務建議方案,包括建議容許出售西九部分住宅項目業權。根據立法會文件,行政會議昨日通過,政府應有條件地同意管理局關於放寬西九的加強財務安排,包括解除解除西九第2區住宅發展項目「只能以建造、營運及移交 模式發展」的限制,允許出售該區的住宅發展項目。 政府並施加以下條件,包括管理局須設立獨立指定銀行帳戶,以存放從批標予私人發展商出售第2區住宅發展項目中所得的收益及其所產生的利息收入,以便監察;管理局須嚴格遵守政府制定的多項財務紀律關鍵績效指標。

creator: Notícias ao Minuto

title: Natural disasters cost China $13bn from January to June
content: Natural disasters such as flooding, drought and extreme temperatures cost China 93.1bn yuan (R232bn) in the first half of the year, with almost 33-million people affected, the government said. Heavy snow, 22 strong earthquakes including one of 7.1 magnitude in the northwestern region of Xinjiang, landslides and mudslides in southwestern regions and flooding on the Yellow River and in southern provinces added to the burden. content: சென்னை, விடுதலை படத்தின் வெற்றியைத்தொடர்ந்து இயக்குனர் வெற்றிமாறன் விடுதலை படத்தின் இரண்டாம் பாகத்தை தற்போது உருவாக்கி வருகிறார். இதில் சூரி, விஜய் சேதுபதி ஆகியோருடன் இணைந்து மஞ்சு வாரியர், அட்டகத்தி தினேஷ் ஆகியோர் முக்கிய கதாபாத்திரங்களில் நடித்து வருகின்றனர். இந்த படத்தை வெற்றிமாறனின் கிராஸ் ரூட் பிலிம் கம்பெனி நிறுவனமும் ஆர் எஸ் இன்போடெயின்மென்ட் நிறுவனமும் ரெட் ஜெயன்ட் மூவிஸ் நிறுவனமும் இணைந்து தயாரிக்கிறது. மிகுந்த எதிர்பார்ப்புகளுடன் உருவாகி வரும் இந்த படத்தின் படப்பிடிப்பு கிட்டதட்ட...

title: Jet2, Ryanair, Easyjet, TUI passengers warned over new £1 per minute charge
creator: newsdesk@nottinghampost.com (James Rodger, Ben Lyons)
content: Passengers of Jet2, Ryanair, Easyjet and TUI have been alerted about the steep drop-off parking charges at airports, with some demanding as much as £1 per minute. The warning applies to four major UK airports where prices have seen a significant increase. According to recent research by the RAC, the cost for a 10-minute drop-off has risen by approximately £1. London Gatwick now demands £6 for 10 minutes, Edinburgh £5 for the same duration, Birmingham £5 for 15 minutes and Bristol £6 for 10...

content: Sudeći prema najavama Republičkog hidrometeorološkog zavoda (RHMZ), dugoročna vremenska prognoza, od polovine jula do polovine avgusta, donosi nam vreme sa temperaturama u proseku najvišim do 36 stepena Celzijusa. title: В реке Тьмака в Твери нашли труп мужчины
content: В Твери утонул мужчина, сообщило МЧС в своем телеграм-канале. Тело было обнаружено в реке Тьмака в районе улицы Строителей. Сотрудники МЧС извлекли труп из воды и передали полицейским для установления всех обстоятельств трагедии. Спасатели просят граждан внимательно относиться к требованиям безопасности: нельзя оставлять детей без присмотра, плавать в незнакомом месте, а также в нетрезвом виде, заплывать за буйки и ограждения, игнорировать знак «Купание запрещено».

title: Kings' Byfield agrees to extension
content: Forward Quinton Byfield has agreed to a five-year, $31.25 million contract extension with the Los Angeles Kings. The Kings announced the deal Monday for Byfield, the No. 2 overall pick in the 2020 NHL draft. The contract runs through the 2028-29 season. The 21-year-old Byfield made significant strides last season with the Kings, recording a career-high 20 goals and 35 assists while playing 80 games. He was the first Los Angeles player to record a 20-goal season at his age since captain Anze...

title: Fresno St. football coach stepping down
content: Fresno State football coach Jeff Tedford announced Monday he's stepping down because of health concerns. Tedford, 62, led the Bulldogs to a 44-22 record in five seasons, including two Mountain West Conference championships and four bowl victories. The Bulldogs finished in the AP Top 25 twice during his tenure. "It is with sad emotions that following my recent medical checkup, it is clear that due to health concerns, my family and I have made the decision to step aside as Fresno State's head...

title: Kapolri Sebut Polri Tak Antikritik untuk Pembenahan, Tak Mau Jadi Organisasi Stagnan
content: Jenderal mengaku Polri tidak akan antikritik dalam rangka pembenahan organisasi terlebih dalam transformasi . Hal ini dikatakan saat Sigit memberikan sambutan Rakorwas Kompolnas-Polri di Hotal di kawasan Ancol, Jakarta Utara pada Rabu (17/7/2024). title: Southgate departing as England manager
content: Gareth Southgate has announced he will step down as England manager after eight years in charge. Southgate led England to the final of Euro 2024 — losing 2-1 to Spain on Sunday. "As a proud Englishman, it has been the honour of my life to play for England and to manage England. It has meant everything to me, and I have given it my all," he said. "But it's time for change, and for a new chapter." Be the first to know Get local news delivered to your inbox!

title: Philipsen completes Tour hat trick
content: Jasper Philipsen completed a hat trick of stage wins at this year's Tour de France after Biniam Girmay — his main rival for the best sprinter's green jersey — crashed near the finish on Tuesday. There was no major change in the general classification with two-time champion Tadej Pogacar keeping the overall lead. Hernández outlasts Witt
content: MLB ARLINGTON, Texas — The Los Angeles Dodgers' Teoscar Hernández won the Home Run Derby when he beat local star Bobby Witt Jr. of the Kansas City Royals 14-13 in the final round Monday night. The 31-year-old Hernández hit 49 homers over three rounds that totaled 3.98 miles and became the first Dodgers player to win the derby. Kansas City has never had a winner. title: Batting average near half-century low
content: ARLINGTON, Texas — Baseball can't run away from its lack of runs. Batting averages are near half-century lows. Velocity is at an all-time high. The major league batting average was .240 through April and .239 in May, the lowest since the bottom of .237 in 1968's Year of the Pitcher. It's risen slightly along with the temperature as spring turned to summer: .246 in June and .250 in July. Still, the season average of .243 heading into the AllStar break was just ahead of 2022 and 1968 as the...

title: Beltré set for All-Star ceremonial first pitch

Beltré will be accompanied by three other former Rangers in the Hall of Fame, pitchers Fergie Jenkins and Nolan Ryan, and catcher Iván Rodríguez. title: Zuljanah Procession Begins As Shia Mourners March From Bota Kadal To Zadibal
creator: KO Web Desk
content: The traditional Zuljanah procession of Shia mourners on the occasion of Youm-e-Ashura began from Bota Kadal to Zadibal, Srinagar on Wednesday morning. The procession began from Bota Kadal amid tight security with hundreds of Shia mourners accompanying the Zuljanah, reported news agency KNO. Traffic police have also issued a detailed advisory to ensure smooth movement during the Zuljanah procession from Bota Kadal to Zadibal.

title: How much sugar is in a glass of wine?
content: What caught my attention, however, was the bottle. It touted a Nutrition Facts label. We don't often see nutrition labels on alcoholic beverages because alcohol is not regulated by the Food and Drug Administration. Instead, these products are under the guidance of the Alcohol and Tobacco Tax and Trade Bureau. So, unlike food products, nutrition labeling on alcohol is only required if the manufacturer makes a nutrition claim such as "light" beer. This particular wine boasted "zero sugar" on its...

title: Setting homes afire to change how they're built
content: The insurance industry is setting homes on fire – just to make a point. The fires are controlled, kindled in a research lab or staged at training facilities used by fire departments. They are designed to simulate the conditions that help wildfires spread through neighborhoods and cause what the insurers call a "conflagration event," like the one that killed 102 people and destroyed the town of Lahaina on Maui in Hawaii last August. There was no major change in the general classification with two-time champion Tadej Pogacar keeping the overall lead. title: DSE放榜2024—一文看清不同分數考生出路 中游考生如何選擇自資院校? 成績不達222A2如何部署?
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 距離中學文憑試(DSE)放榜尚有2日,相信同學們的心情難免都會緊張。《星島教育》為了助考生部署升學路,特別推出「DSE放榜全攻略系列2024」,邀請升學專家拍片傳授放榜攻略之餘,也為考生搜集最新且實用的放榜資訊。上周先有學友社學生輔導顧問吳寶城,今日繼續有香港輔導教師協會秘書葉偉民,跟考生分享其他放榜資訊。 葉偉民表示,考生在取得成績單後,知道考獲理想成績固然開心,然而成績如未能升讀「8大」,仍可考慮自資院校或副學位的課程;至於未如理想成績不及22222或222A2的同學,則可考慮修讀應用教育文憑,或VTC基礎課程文憑,完成後仍可升讀副學位課程,升學途徑非常多元化。 所謂「條條大路通羅馬」,香港升學途徑多元化,同學的成績如未能入讀大學教育資助委員會資助的八所大學(8大)課程,亦可考慮入讀自資院校,當中包括高級文憑或副學士,亦有學士學位課程,因此總會找到適合自己的升學路。香港輔導教師協會秘書葉偉民表示,在放榜前,同學應先估算自己的成績,按「最好」、「最不理想」、「符合理想」這三個層面作出分析,部署在考獲不同分數時,有哪些升學方向。一般來說,可按以下3個層面部署。...

title: NASA’s Perseverance Mars Rover for First Time Uses AI To Identify Minerals Within Martian Rocks To Make Real-Time Decisions
content: In a first, the Perseverance Mars Rover Mission used Artificial Intelligence (AI) on the Red Planet to make autonomous decisions based on real-time analysis of rock composition, said mission officials at NASA. While the Rover Mission has been using AI for nearly three years to autonomously identify minerals within Martian rocks, it is the first time they used the technology on Mars to make real-time decisions about rock composition. title: У Львові оголосили І рівень небезпеки: чого чекати від погоди
content: У Львові та Львівській області на 17 липня оголосили штормове попередження. Про це свідчать дані Львівського регіонального центру з гідрометеорології . "Вдень 17 липня місцями значні дощі", - попереджають синоптики. Також, за їх даними, сьогодні на Львівщині очікуються грози, місцями шквали 15-20 м/с та град. Через негоду оголошено І рівень небезпечності, жовтий. 17 липня на Львівщині буде хмарно з проясненнями. Очікуються короткочасні дощі, вдень місцями опади будуть значними. Грози,...

title: Минэнерго: Электроснабжение потребителей на юге России восстановлено
content: Минэнерго: Электроснабжение потребителей на юге России восстановлено Tекст: Дмитрий Зубарев Как говорится в сообщении, Минэнерго продолжает отслеживать ситуацию с энергоснабжением регионов, в которых наблюдаются аномально высокие температуры, передает ТАСС . Ранее на Юге России временно ограничили потребление электроэнергии из-за сбоя на АЭС.

title: 台積電挫逾2% 台股跌破10日線收23769點
content: 台積電 法人說明會前夕買盤觀望,加上美國總統候選人川普稱台灣應向美國付保護費,影響市場信心,台股今天盤中跌逾340點,加權指數終場收在23769.82點,下跌227.43點,跌幅0.95%,失守10日線約23881點,成交值新台幣5423.64億元。 電子類股指數今天收低1.47%,成交比重逾63%,金融類股指數下跌0.47%;非金電族群的塑膠、生技及營建撐盤,終場分別上漲3.47%、2.36%、1.28%。 權值股部分, 晶圓代工廠 台積電終場以1030元作收,下跌2.37%;聯發科收在1325元,跌幅1.49%;鴻海挫0.47%,收212元。 人工智慧(AI)族群明顯回檔,廣達跌2.64%,收314元;緯創下挫3.96%,收109元。 營建類股下半年將迎來新案交屋潮,吸引資金回流,華固盤中攻漲停未鎖住,終場上漲8.33%,收169元;冠德上揚6.83%,收64.1元。 高頻環氧樹脂(ABF)載板供需下半年將改善,外資看好載板三雄後市,欣興勁揚8.84%,收215.5元,景碩收漲停132元,南電終場漲6.54%,收195.5元。...

title: 金價創高台股黃金概念股走強 佳龍收盤大漲逾9%
content: 市場預期美國通膨降溫持續支撐聯準會9月降息機率,吸引買盤推升黃 金價 格創高,帶動 台股 黃金概念股今天「金光閃閃」,佳龍一度鎖漲停,收盤大漲逾9%, 光洋科 上漲1.85%,股價表現勝過台股大盤。 國際金價16日創高,現貨黃金達每英兩2469.08美元,帶動黃金概念股表現活躍,佳龍今天盤中衝上漲板38.95元,但收在38.7元,仍大漲9.17%。 金益鼎盤中高點87元,勁揚6.74%,不過收跌在80.2元、跌幅1.6%;光洋科收71.5元,上揚1.85%。 法人指出,美元走低疑慮下,黃金成最佳保值工具,帶動價格飆升;佳龍、金益鼎、光洋科皆從事廢資訊品、混合五金處及貴金屬回收及處理,從廢五金提出有價值的黃金,也是這波金價上漲受惠者。

title: Researchers extract gold from e-waste using cheesemaking byproduct
content: In a paper published in Advanced Materials, scientists at ETH Zurich used a protein fibril sponge derived from whey, a byproduct of the cheese industry. Extracting gold from electronic waste is a complex and often hazardous process that uses harmful chemicals such as nitric and hydrochloric acids and cyanide solutions to strip away the plastic and other non-metal components from the shredded electronic waste and then isolate and recover the gold. The Swiss researchers, led by Professor Raffaele...

content: به گزارش ایسنا، متخصصان به طور کلی ۱۸ عامل خطرناک قابل اصلاح را در ۳۰ نوع سرطان شناسایی کردند. به گفته آنها این عوامل با ۷۰۰ هزار مورد جدید سرطان و بیش از ۲۶۲ هزار مرگ در سال ۲۰۱۹ مرتبط بوده‌اند. دکتر «عارف کمال»، مدیر ارشد انجمن سرطان آمریکا، تاکید کرد افراد می‌تواند با تغییر سبک زندگی خود خطر ابتلا به سرطان را کاهش دهند. دکتر کمال می‌گوید هرچند سرطان به عوامل مختلفی بستگی دارد اما نباید نقش سبک زندگی را در ایجاد این بیماری دست کم گرفت. به گفته وی، خطرات قابل تغییر نسبت به سایر عوامل، سهم...

title: 沖繩西原高校行進樂隊抵台 師生高喊台灣我來了
content: 受中華文化總會邀請來台,參與2024 總統府 音樂會 演出的日本沖繩縣立西原高等學校行進樂隊,今天中午搭機抵台,師生們興奮高喊「台灣我來了」,也想品嚐小籠包與珍珠奶茶。 由總統府及文總主辦的「2024總統府音樂會-自由之力」20日晚間7時將於兩廳院藝文廣場登場,西原高等學校行進樂隊71名師生,今天中午12時4分搭乘中華航空CI121班機抵台,學生們穿著亮眼的紫色制服外套,下機後立即展現親和力,除了和接機人員親切的打招呼,並在合照時高喊「台灣我來了」,興奮之情溢於言表。 文總副秘書長黃竫蕙接受媒體聯訪表示,2024年總統府音樂會-自由之力,預計在20日晚上舉行,今年文總特地邀請沖繩西原 高校 行進樂隊來台演出。這幾年台灣在國際間日益受重視,也有很多國外友人來台,當然在節目的安排上也要與世界接軌,去年總統府音樂會就邀請了日本歌手一青窈,以及民主陣線立陶宛人聲合唱團來台灣演出。...

title: 桃園少年無照機車雙載連兩撞 釀1死1重傷
content: 桃市昨天晚間發生死亡 車禍 ,陳姓少年騎車載丁姓少年行經楊梅區楊湖路三段時疑視線不良先擦撞路邊大貨車,再與後方的 未成年 友人機車擦撞,陳姓少年不治,丁姓少年傷重送醫急救。 桃園市政府警察局楊梅分局今天向媒體表示,17歲陳姓少年昨天晚間10時許騎機車載17歲的丁姓少年,行經楊梅區楊湖路三段時,疑因天色昏暗視線不良擦撞停放路邊的大貨車。 警方指出,陳姓少年的機車倒地後,與騎在後方的友人、17歲何姓少年的機車發生擦撞;陳姓少年送醫後傷重不治,丁姓少年身體多處受傷,經送湖口鄉仁慈醫院急救,目前轉新北市林口 長庚 醫院救治。 警方表示,3名少年酒精檢驗值均為零,陳姓、何姓少年均未成年且無駕照,事故發生詳細原因待釐清;遭撞大貨車當時停放路邊,因有壓到白線故有妨礙他車通行違規情事,將依道路交通管理處罰條例開罰。

title: It's too early to be fighting a space race with China
content: China's space program in late June brought back the first rock and soil samples from the mysterious far side of the moon. It was a major triumph. Scientists are eager to use these samples to learn more about the origin of the moon and Earth. At the same time, others are worried China is on the way to winning a new space race for the first permanent base on the moon. title: दुर्गा मंदिर परिसर के हवन कुंड के पास मिली लाश:रात में अनजान व्यक्ति के पास था फोन, केवाईसी का फॉर्म जमा करने आया था समस्तीपुर

title: VIDEO : युवती से छेड़छाड़ करने पर लोगों ने बीच बाजार युवक को धुना
content: उत्तर प्रदेश के एटा में बुधवार को युवती से छेड़छाड़ करने पर लोगों ने बीच बाजार युवक को धुन दिया। ऑटो में बैठते समय आरोपी ने युवती से अभद्रता की। छेड़छाड़ करने पर लोग एकत्र हो गए। आरोपी नशे में धुत था। एकत्र लोगों ने उसे धुन दिया। सूचना पर पुलिस पहुंच गई। पुलिस के सामने भी लोग उस पर थप्पड़ बरसाते रहे। पुलिस ने किसी तरह उसे लोगों के चंगुल से बचाया। उसे बाद अपने साथ लेकर चली गई। घटना कोतवाली नगर क्षेत्र के रोडवेज बस स्टैंड की है। बताया गया कि आरोपी युवक मारहरा थाना क्षेत्र का रहने वाला है।

title: 科技業吸走人才 技職找無建築、電子、資訊教師
content: 少子化加上科技業吸走大量人才,影響 教師 供需。台中市教育局長蔣偉民今天提出,多所技職近3年聘不到 建築 、電子、資訊科專任教師, 教育部 則以規劃公費培育回應。 教育部今天在宜蘭縣召開民國113年度全國教育局處長會議,蔣偉民提案指出,台中市多數技職近3年增聘建築科、電子科、資訊科專任教師,居然都沒有人應聘,原因是許多人修了教育學分,畢業後還是投入產業,且沒有意願再回到教育界,可見現有人才庫出現問題。 蔣偉民指建議可針對師資嚴重短缺的職種,增開「學士後師資培育班」,同時也設立獎助金,鼓勵大學在校生加修師資培育課程。 對此,教育部師資培育及藝術教育司長武曉霞表示,目前多數職業類科的師資儲備,仍在安全範圍內,但確實有少數科別儲備量略低。 武曉霞表示,教育部評估對於上述儲備量低的科別,規劃公費培育,透過獎學金等方式,增加優秀學子投入教職的意願。她並提到,技術型高中(高職)師資議題,已納入新一期的師資培育白皮書探討,將研擬相應的策略。...

title: Registrado un terremoto de 2 grados en Lorca
content: Lorca registró en la mañana de este miércoles un terremoto, según indica el Instituto Geográfico Nacional. El seísmo, de 2 grados de magnitud en la escala de Richter, se produjo sobre las 8.17 horas. Es el segundo terremoto de esta semana en la Región después de que este lunes un temblor de 2,9 grados se dejara notar en Murcia.

Havanın kararmasıyla ara verilen havadan müdahale günün ilk ışıklarıyla helikopterle yeniden başladı. Yangında şimdiye kadar yaklaşık 5 hektarlık alanın zarar gördüğü öğrenildi.

title: Scotland’s economy forecast to grow at faster rate than last year
creator: Craig Meighan
content: PwC’s UK Economic Outlook report predicts a gross value added (GVA) of 0.9% for Scotland in 2024, higher than the 0.3% predicted for 2023. It also forecast GDP growth of 1% for the UK in 2024. title: Differentiating criminal from civil matters
creator: Yejide Gbenga-Ogundare
content: The Nigeria legal system addresses the wrongdoings that people commit with two different types of cases: civil and criminal. But many are accused of criminal offences for civil issues because they don’t know the difference. Criminal cases are offences against the state, even if immediate harm is done to an individual. Accordingly, they are prosecuted by the state in a criminal court. But civil cases typically involve disputes between parties regarding the legal duties and responsibilities they...

title: В Ломоносовском районе у доктора угнали машину
content: У терапевта заводской амбулатории Ломоносовской больницы угнали автомобиль марки Kia Cerato, припаркованный у многоквартирного дома в деревне Ломоносовского района. Пропажу автомобиля врач обнаружил рано утром 16 июля, сообщил источник в правоохранительных органах. Автомобиль застрахован, оборудован штатной сигнализацией и спутниковой системой слежения. title: Haití con 12 casos de ántrax y dos muertos; hay 10 hospitalizados
creator: PRENSA LATINA
content: Puerto Príncipe, 17 jul.- Dos personas murieron y 10 están hospitalizadas en Haití tras consumir carne de res contaminada con ántrax, informó hoy la prensa local. La intoxicación ocurrió en Bayara, la primera sección comunal de Petit-Goâve, precisó el diario digital Haití Libre. De acuerdo con la literatura médica, el ántrax, también llamado carbunco, es una enfermedad infecciosa causada concretamente por la bacteria Bacillus anthracis. title: Nine-year-old shooting victim ‘may never speak or move properly again’
content: The youngster was eating dinner with her family at a restaurant in Kingsland High Street, Dalston, on May 29 when a lone motorcyclist fired “a number of shots” towards the building. She remains in a critical condition 49 days after the attack. Three men sitting outside the restaurant – aged 37, 42 and 44 – were also shot but were discharged from hospital a few days later. title: Paris mayor will swim in the Seine River to showcase its improved cleanliness ahead of the Olympics
content: PARIS (AP) — After months of anticipation, Paris Mayor Anne Hidalgo is set to swim in the Seine River later on Wednesday, fulfilling a promise she made in January nine days before the opening ceremony of the 2024 Olympics. The swim will occur along the stretch of the river that passes by the imposing-looking City Hall and the Notre Dame Cathedral as part of a broader effort to showcase the river’s improved cleanliness. title: ‘Man-caused global warming theory a scam’
content: No, our part of the planet is not experiencing a climate change crisis. Climate change is a phenomenon that occurs over hundreds of thousands to millions of years. None of us will see any change to our climate in our lifetime, neither will our children nor our children’s children to dozens of generations to come. What we do experience is the normal variability of weather events that exist in any climate found on this earth. And stating that fossil fuel use or just about anything caused by man...

content: It was previously closer to a coin flip at ~49% before the inflation numbers . title: По шести маршрутам ведут авиапатрулирование лесов специалисты ЕЛЦ
content: Полёты малой авиации над лесными просторами Поморья стали уже привычным делом. И объясняется это достаточно просто: воздушный мониторинг, или авиапатрулирование, входит в число наиболее эффективных способов раннего обнаружения лесных пожаров. Сегодня в штате Единого лесопожарного центра Архангельской области трудятся 16 лётчиков-наблюдателей, осуществляющих облёт лесного фонда области в поисках очагов возгораний. title: 日本地方民代開會玩手遊 被參訪小學生抓包
content: 日本宮城縣大河原町1名 議員 日前在議會全體會議上玩手機遊戲,被來參訪的 小學生 發現,大河原町議會昨天召開全體會議追究此事,被「抓包」的當事人已致歉。 仙台放送報導,大河原町公所指出,一群小六學生6月10日到町議會全體會議參訪時,發現有議員在桌子下方使用智慧型手機。其中5名小學生在參觀後的心得報告中提到「議員用智慧型手機玩遊戲」,此事因而曝光。 讀賣新聞報導,大河原町議會全員協議會昨天召開會議時,町議會最大會派(由數名議員組成的團體)透露,已確定7月底將在町議會上提出勸告該名議員辭職的決議案。而第二大會派原則上也同意,因此預料町議會將通過這份決議案。 被小學生發現玩手遊的議員為佐藤貴久,現年73歲,曾任大河原町議會議長。 他昨天在全員協議會解釋,「我並非在玩遊戲,而是打開畫面觀看(手機)」,並宣稱「在議場玩手遊是事實,但是我對此沒有印象」。 佐藤也致歉說:「讓小學生感到失望,對此深刻反省」;而其他町議員對於佐藤反覆辯稱「不記得」感到不可思議,出現不少嚴厲批評聲浪。...

title: Охранники в Петрозаводске заковали покупателя в наручники, а снять не смогли
content: Как сообщили в МЧС Карелии, в ночь на 17 июля в 1.45 сотрудники частного охранного предприятия (ЧОП) обратились к пожарным-спасателям за помощью. title: New transmission lines to improve Bohol’s power situation
content: MANILA — The province of Bohol can expect a better power situation as the National Grid Corporation of the Philippines (NGCP) targets to complete the Cebu-Bohol 230 kilovolt (kV) line this December. title: Merckx vuelve a correr el Tour

title: Sardar 2: கார்த்தியின் சர்தார் 2 படப்பிடிப்பில் விபத்து: 20 அடி பள்ளத்தில் விழுந்து சண்டை பயிற்சியாளர் உயிரிழப்பு
creator: ராகேஷ் தாரா
content: சர்தார் 2 பி.எஸ் மித்ரன் இயக்கத்தில் நடிகர் கார்த்தி தற்போது சர்தார் 2 படத்தில் நடித்து வருகிறார். இப்படத்தின் படப்பிடிப்பு கடந்த ஜூலை 15 ஆம் தேதி சென்னையில் துவங்கியது. சென்னை சாலிகிராமம் அருணாச்சலம் சாலையில் உள்ள பிரசாத் சண்டைக் காட்சி நேற்று படமாக்கப்பட்டுள்ளது. அப்போது 20 அடி உயரத்தில் சண்டை பயிற்சியாளர் ஏழுமலை என்பவர் எந்தவித பாதுகாப்பு உபகரணங்களும் இன்றி சண்டை பயிற்சியில் ஈடுபட்டுக் கொண்டிருந்த போது மேலிருந்து தவறி கீழே விழுந்துள்ளார். உடனடியாக அருகில் உள்ள தனியார் மருத்துவமனையில்...
